Page.Head:
<title>Askia Survey</title>

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, minimal-ui">
<style type="text/css">

  html {
	height: 100%;
  }
  body {
	background-color: #eeeeee;
	margin: 0px;
	padding: 0px;
  }

  /* Global font family - font size and color for the responses*/
  body, td, th, div, p, pre, a, span, li, input, select, textarea, label, legend {
	font-family:"Swiss 721 BT", Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;
	font-size: 1.0em;
	line-height: 1.0em;
	color: #555555;
	outline: none;
	text-decoration: none;
  }
  *:focus {
    	outline: 0;
  }
  a:link{
	text-decoration:none;
  }
  a:hover{
	text-decoration:underline;
  }
  a:visited{
	text-decoration:none;
  }

  blockquote, q {
	quotes: none;
  }
  blockquote:before, blockquote:after, q:before, q:after {
	content: '';
	content: none;
  }

  /* remember to define focus styles! */
  :focus {
	outline: 0;
  }

  /* remember to highlight inserts somehow! */
  ins {
	text-decoration: none;
  }
  del {
	text-decoration: line-through;
  }

  /* tables still need 'cellspacing="0"' in the markup */
  table {
	border-collapse: collapse;
	border-spacing: 0;
  }
  .grid {
	width: 100%;
  }
  ul {
	list-style: none;
	margin: 1%;
	padding: 0%;
  }
  .myresponse {
	color: #555555;
	padding: 10px;
	font-size: 1.0em;
	text-decoration: none;
	border: 1px solid #a1a7ad;
	-webkit-border-radius: 2px;
	-moz-border-radius: 2px;
	border-radius: 2px;
	transition: all ease-in-out .4s;
   }
  .myresponseclassic {
	color: #555555;
	padding: 5px;
	font-size: 1.0em;
	text-decoration: none;
	transition: all ease-in-out .4s;
   }
  .gridmyresponse, .gridmyresponseheader, .gridmyresponseclassic {
	background-color: #ffffff;
	color: #555555;
	font-size: 1.0em;
	margin-bottom: 0px;
	padding: 10px;
	text-decoration: none;
	border: 1px solid #a1a7ad;
	-webkit-border-radius: 2px;
	-moz-border-radius: 2px;
	border-radius: 2px;
	transition: all ease-in-out .4s;
   }
  .gridmyresponse:hover {
	background-color: #f7f7f7;
	cursor:pointer;
   }

  .gridmyresponseclassic {
	cursor:pointer;
  }

/*   input[type="radio"], input[type="checkbox"] {
	width:18px;
	height:18px;
  } */

  /* Numerical and Open ended on one row */
  input[type="text"], input[type="number"] {
	background-color: #ffffff;
	border: 1px solid #a1a7ad;
	-webkit-border-radius: 2px;
	-moz-border-radius: 2px;
	border-radius: 2px;
	text-align: left;
	font-size: 1.0em;
  }
  input[type="text"]:hover, input[type="number"]:hover {
	
  }
  input[type="text"]:focus, input[type="number"]:focus {
	border: 1px solid #444444;
  }

  /* Open ended on several rows */
  textarea {
	width:97%;
	background-color: #ffffff;
	border: 1px solid #a1a7ad;
	-webkit-border-radius: 2px;
	-moz-border-radius: 2px;
	border-radius: 2px;
	font-size: 1.0em;
	padding:5px;
  }
  textarea:hover {
	
  }
  textarea:focus {
	border: 1px solid #444444;
  }

  /* Question caption */
  #question {
	color: #555555;
	font-size: 1.1em;
	padding: 10px 0 10px 0;
  }

  /* Chapter caption */
  #chapter {
	color: #555555;
	font-size: 1.1em;
	padding: 10px 0 10px 0;
  }

  /* Label caption */
  .label {
	color: #555555;
	font-size: 1.1em;
	padding: 10px 0 10px 0;
  }
  /* Error message */
  #error-summary {
	color: #e9680e;
	font-size: 1.1em;
	text-align: center;
  }
  
  /* Empty row and separator*/
  .empty-row {
  	height:1em;
  }
  .separator {

	line-height: 1em;

	border-bottom: 1px solid #cfcfcf;

  }

  /* Width of the container */
  #headercontent, .framecontainer, #navcontent {
	width: 100%;
  }

  /* mainframe structure */
  #mainframe {
	position: absolute;
	width: 100%;
	overflow: visible;
	background-color: #eeeeee;
  }
  
  /* header structure */
  #headercontainer {
	position: absolute;
	top: 0px;
	right: 0px;
	width: 100%;
	height: 3.7em;
	background-color: #868686;
	background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#000000), to(#868686));
	background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #000000, #868686);
	background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #000000, #868686);
	background-image: -o-linear-gradient(top, #000000, #868686);
	background-image: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #000000, #868686);
	background-image: linear-gradient(top, #000000, #868686);
	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorStr='#000000', EndColorStr='#868686');
  }
  #headercontent {
	max-width: 980px;
	position: relative;
	margin: 0 auto;
	padding: 10px 0 0 0;
  }
  #header{
	width: 100%;
  }
  #header ul{
	display: block;
  }
  #header, #header li{
	list-style: none;
	display: inline-block;
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
  }
  #lileft{
	width:40%;
	float: left;
	text-align: left;
	background-color: transparent;
	border: 0px solid #dddddd;
  }
  #lileft img {
	width: 45px;
	height: 45px;
	margin-top: -2px;
  }
  #limiddle {
	width:15%;
	float: left;
	text-align: center;
	background-color: transparent;
	border: 0px solid #dddddd;
  }
  #liright {
	width:40%;
	float: right;
	text-align: right;
	background-color: transparent;
	border: 0px solid #dddddd;
  }
  #lileftsep {
	width:10px;
	float: left;
	background-color: transparent;
	border: 0px solid #dddddd;
  }
  #lirightsep {
	width:10px;
	float: right;
	background-color: transparent;
	border: 0px solid #dddddd;
  }
  
  /* progress bar structure */
  #progress{
	width: 100%;
  }
  #progress ul{
	display: block;
	height: 1.5em;
  }
  #progress, #progress li {
	list-style: none;
	display: inline-block;
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
  }
  #liprogress {
    	float: right;
	width: 100px;
	height: 0.6em;
	text-align: left;
	background-color: transparent;
	border: 1px solid #cfcfcf;
	-webkit-border-radius: 2px;
	-moz-border-radius: 2px;
	border-radius: 2px;
  }
  #liprogress div {
	height: 100%;
	background-color: #cfcfcf;
	background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#fdffff), to(#cfcfcf));
	background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #fdffff, #cfcfcf);
	background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #fdffff, #cfcfcf);
	background-image: -o-linear-gradient(top, #fdffff, #cfcfcf);
	background-image: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #fdffff, #cfcfcf);
	background-image: linear-gradient(top, #fdffff, #cfcfcf);
	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorStr='#fdffff', EndColorStr='#cfcfcf');
  }
  
  /* frame structure */
  .framecontainer {
	position: relative;
	top: -5px;
	margin: 0 auto;
  }
  .framecontent {
	/* min-height: 100px; */
	max-width: 960px;
	padding: 5px 5px 0 5px;
	margin: 0 auto;
  }
  
  /* navigation button structure */
  #navcontainer{
	display: inline-block;
	text-align: center;
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	width: 100%;
  }
  #navcontent {
	margin: 0 auto;
	padding: 5px 0 0 0;
  }
  #navcontentleft {
	display:inline;
	float: left;
	width: 5%;
	text-align: left;
	padding: 0;
	background-color: transparent;
	border: 0px solid #555555;
  }
  #navcontentmiddle {
	display:inline;
	float: left;
	width: 89%;
	text-align: center;
	padding: 0;
	background-color: transparent;
	border: 0px solid #555555;
  }
  #navcontentright {
	display:inline;
	float: left;
	width: 5%;
	text-align: right;
	padding: 0;
	background-color: transparent;
	border: 0px solid #555555;
  }
  #navseparator {
	display: inline;
	margin: 0 5% 0 5%;
  }
  .button {
    	background-color: #5ca0d3;
	background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#5ca0d3), to(#42749e));
	background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #5ca0d3, #42749e);
	background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #5ca0d3, #42749e);
	background-image: -o-linear-gradient(top, #5ca0d3, #42749e);
	background-image: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #5ca0d3, #42749e);
	background-image: linear-gradient(top, #5ca0d3, #42749e);
	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(GradientType=0,StartColorStr='#5ca0d3', EndColorStr='#42749e'), progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Chroma(color=#000000);
    	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px #c8ced4 inset;
    	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px #c8ced4 inset;
    	box-shadow: 0px 1px #c8ced4 inset;
    	-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
    	-moz-border-radius: 4px;
    	border-radius: 4px;
    	text-shadow: 0px -1px 0px #c8ced4;
    	border: 1px solid #69b4d6;
    	font-size: 22px;
    	color: #ffffff;
    	font-weight: bold;
    	width: 90px;
    	height: 35px;
	transition: all ease-in-out .4s;
  }
  .button:hover {
    	background-color: #366083;
	background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#366083), to(#4376A0));
	background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #366083, #4376A0);
	background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #366083, #4376A0);
	background-image: -o-linear-gradient(top, #366083, #4376A0);
	background-image: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #366083, #4376A0);
	background-image: linear-gradient(top, #366083, #4376A0);
	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(GradientType=0,StartColorStr='#366083', EndColorStr='#4376A0'), progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Chroma(color=#000000);
    	border: 1px solid #4376A0;
	cursor: pointer;
  }
  .media-capture {
	background: #3b88d8;
    	background: -moz-linear-gradient(0% 100% 90deg, #377ad0, #52a8e8);
    	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0% 0%, 0% 100%, from(#52a8e8), to(#377ad0));
    	/* border-top: 1px solid #4081af;
    	border-right: 1px solid #2e69a3;
    	border-bottom: 1px solid #20559a;
    	border-left: 1px solid #2e69a3;*/
    	-moz-border-radius: 2px;
    	-webkit-border-radius: 2px;
    	border-radius: 2px;
    	-moz-box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 0 #72b9eb, 0 1px 2px 0 #b3b3b3;
    	-webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 0 #72b9eb, 0 1px 2px 0 #b3b3b3;
    	color: #fff;
    	font-family: "lucida grande", sans-serif;
    	font-size: 16px;
    	font-weight: normal;
    	line-height: 2;
    	padding: 4px 0 6px 0;
    	text-align: center;
    	text-shadow: 0 -1px 1px #3275bc;
    	width: 100%;
	height: 50px;
	margin: 40px auto;
    	-webkit-background-clip: padding-box;
  }

  .media-capture:hover {
    	background: #2a81d7;
    	background: -moz-linear-gradient(0% 100% 90deg, #206bcb, #3e9ee5);
    	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0% 0%, 0% 100%, from(#3e9ee5), to(#206bcb));
    	-moz-box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 0 #62b1e9;
    	-webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 0 #62b1e9;
    	cursor: pointer;
    	text-shadow: 0 -1px 1px #1d62ab;
    	-webkit-background-clip: padding-box;
  }

  .media-capture:active {
    	background: #3282d3;
    	-moz-box-shadow: inset 0 0 6px 3px #1657b5, 0 1px 0 0 #fff;
    	-webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 6px 3px #1657b5, 0 1px 0 0 #fff;
    	text-shadow: 0 -1px 1px #2361a4;
    	-webkit-background-clip: padding-box;
  }

  .media-capture div {
	color: #FFFFFF;
	font-size: 1.3em;
	font-weight: bold;
  }
</style>
